_comment_agent: agent: true/false - Enable agent functionality for each AI service
_comment_agentPreference: Set agent: true on multiple services to enable fallback between them
_comment_example1: Example: gemini.agent=true, localAI.agent=true will try Gemini first, then LocalAI
_comment_example2: Example: only localAI.agent=true will use LocalAI exclusively for agent tasks
